sentences.en: ...some 500 kilometres to the southwest of Johannesburg.
sentences.cn: …约翰内斯堡西南约五百公里。

sentences.en: A southwest shower lashed the window - panes.
sentences.cn: 西南风送来的雨拍打着窗玻璃.

sentences.en: A sweet white wine from the Sauternes region of southwest France.
sentences.cn: 伊坤葡萄酒法国西南部舒''.'特'.''''.'恩'.''''.'斯'.''地区生产的一种甜葡萄酒.

sentences.en: Another blare of trumpets signaled that the limousine carrying Brezhnev had entered the Southwest Gate.
sentences.cn: 在又一阵军号声中,勃列日涅夫的小轿车进入西南门.

sentences.en: He hoisted his patched sails and set his course toward the southwest.
sentences.cn: 他扯起有补丁的船帆开始向西南方向驶去.

sentences.en: Longshan days in the caves, 40 km southwest of Taiyuan Tianlong mountainside.
sentences.cn: 天龙山石窟在太原市西南40公里天龙山腰.

sentences.en: My parents have a ranch in the Southwest that is a most incredible archeological preserve.
sentences.cn: 我的父母在SOUTHWEST有个农场,那里有个考古保护区.

sentences.en: Spain lies to the southwest of France.
The Colorado River rises in the Rockies and flows southwest into the Gulf of California.
sentences.cn: 科罗拉多河起源于落矶山脉,朝西南流入加利福尼亚湾.

sentences.en: The community of Meado Wood , adjoined the southwest limits of the airfield.
sentences.cn: 梅多伍德的居民区和机场的西南边缘接壤.

sentences.en: The German commander persisted on his course to the southwest, leaving behind a marked oil trace.
sentences.cn: 德国司令官继续向西南方向驶去, 舰后留下一条显著的油的航迹.

sentences.en: The southwest of the two countries is entirely different.
sentences.cn: 两国的西南部是截然不同的.

sentences.en: The West Wing is the square building in the lower - left ( southwest ) corner.
sentences.cn: 左下角 ( 西南方向 ) 的长方形的建筑就是西翼.

sentences.en: They weave through the southwest desert like a snake stalking its prey.
sentences.cn: 大峡谷裂缝在西南部沙漠上蜿蜒迂回,犹如蛇朝它的猎物悄悄地潜行着一般.

sentences.en: This blue - white gem appears to the southwest ( lower left ) of Arcturus.
sentences.cn: 这个蓝白宝石一样的星星出现在大角星的西南方向.

sentences.en: We took a plane southwest across the Anatolian plateau to Cappadocia.
sentences.cn: 我们乘飞机朝西南方,越过安纳托利亚高原,飞往卡帕多细亚。

words.tran_cn: 向西南的；来自西南方的；在西南方的

trans.tran_en: a southwest wind comes from the southwest
If you go southwest, you travel toward the southwest
the direction that is exactly between south and west
